text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- France urges its companies to invest in Iraq.
- Iraq works for serious implementation of oil-for-food deal with United Nations.
- U.N. says Iraq cooperating well to carry out terms of oil deal.
- Foreign minister briefs Arab League on Turkish violations in northern Iraq.
- United Arab Emirates protests against Iranian remarks.
- Arab workers demand withdrawal of Turkish invasion troops from northern Iraq.
- U.N., Russia and China renew call for withdrawal of Turkish troops.
- British organisation says United States is worst dictator in world.
- National Assembly renews call for withdrawal of Turkish troops from northern Iraq.
- Egyptian writer urges Arabs to rally behind Iraq.
(The above were also carried by AL-IRAQ)
- Commentary says Turkey can preserve security of its borders through cooperation with central government in Baghdad.
- Commentary says Gulf security cannot be realised without Iraq.
